Any weapon that helps strengthen their power WILL be used against us.

comment: It's the equivalent of Richard Spencer's defence of the EU concept on the grounds that a hypothetical pro-white federal Europe could fight for whites more effectively than tens of individual white nation states, while preserving national differences. comment: Yup. It's impractical but good example of what I like about Richard, his optimism and willingness to talk about ultimate goals. There may be a few things that can be done within the current system, and reasonable medium-term goals outside it ("Ethnic cleansing in one country"), but if we accept short sighted Amnat shit it will be compromised down to nothing.

comment: There was an interesting tweet from Richard not too long ago that criticized the AltRight.
